targets.expr:
clamp_min(
  100 *
  (
sum(rate({__name__=~".*_http_client_requests_total",status=~"2..",application=~"$application"}[1m]))
    /
    sum(rate({__name__=~".*_http_client_requests_total",application=~"$application"}[1m]))
  ),
  0
)

clamp_min(
  100 *
  (
    sum by (uri) (
      rate({__name__=~".*_http_client_requests_total",
            status=~"2..",
            uri=~"$uri"}[1m])
    )
  )
  /
  (
    sum by (uri) (
      rate({__name__=~".*_http_client_requests_total",
            uri=~"$uri"}[1m])
    )
  ),
  0
)

1000 *
histogram_quantile(
  0.01,
  sum by (le,application, method, uri, status) (
rate({__name__=~".*_http_client_requests_seconds_bucket",application=~"$application",method=~"$method",uri=~"$uri"}[1m])
  )
)

panels.title: Summary Request Count by Uri (Elapsed time)

targets.expr: floor(sum(increase({__name__=~".*_http_client_requests_total"}[1m])))

clamp_min(
  100 *
  (
    sum by (uri) (
      rate({__name__=~".*_http_client_requests_total",
            status=~"2..",
            uri=~"$uri"}[$__range])
    )
  )
  /
  (
    sum by (uri) (
      rate({__name__=~".*_http_client_requests_total",
            uri=~"$uri"}[$__range])
    )
  ),
  0
)

1000 *
histogram_quantile(
  0.01,
  sum by (le,application, method, uri, status) (
rate({__name__=~".*_http_client_requests_seconds_bucket",application=~"$application",method=~"$method",uri=~"$uri"}[$__range])
  )
)

1000 *
histogram_quantile(
  0.01,
  sum by (le, uri) (
    rate({__name__=~".*_http_client_requests_seconds_bucket",uri=~"$uri"}[$__range])
  )
)

1000* (sum by(uri)  (rate({__name__=~".*_http_client_requests_seconds_sum",uri=~"$uri"}[$__range]))
/
sum by(uri)  (rate({__name__=~".*_http_client_requests_seconds_count",uri=~"$uri"}[$__range])))

panels.title: Summary Average Request Time on Range

targets.expr: floor(sum(increase({__name__=~".*_http_client_requests_total"}[$__range])))
sum by (status)({__name__=~".*_http_client_requests_total"})
